# csd_zones (Data Source)



## Example Usage

```terraform
data "csd_zones" "all" {}

output "all_zones" {
  value = data.csd_zones.all
}
```

### Read-Only

- `id` (String) The ID of this resource.
- `zones` (List of Object) List of configured DNS zones (see [below for nested schema](#nestedatt--zones))
